extendedInfo.description: If bug exists, please tell us (E-mail), we will fix it as soon as possible.Avatar: The Last Airbender is an American animated television series that aired for three seasons on Nickelodeon from 2005 to 2008. The series was created and produced by Michael Dante DiMartino and Bryan Konietzko, who served as executive producers along with Aaron Ehasz. Avatar is set in an Asian-influenced world wherein some are able to manipulate the classical elements by use of psychokinetic variants of Chinese martial arts known as "bending." The show combined the styles of anime and American cartoons, and relied for imagery upon various East-Asian, Inuit, and South-American societies, with a brief reference to the Indic.You can change the Wallpapers from the menu by selecting âChoose Wallpaperâ. The first five Wallpapers are stored in the application. Everyone else will be downloaded from the Internet and stored in a folder(wallpaper _duomob).This theme is compatible with Crazy Home Pro, Crazy Home Lite, ADW Launcher, Live Home, Open Home, Open Home 6, aHome, 91 Panda Home, 91 Panda Home 2.If using Crazy Home, once it is installed and running, press your Menu Key -> Crazy Menu -> Appearance -> Set Theme.If using ADW.Launcher, once it is installed and running, press your Menu Key -> More -> ADWSettings -> Themes Preferences.If using Go Launcher Ex, once it is installed and running, press your Menu Key -> Themes-> Select theme-> Apply.This application does not violate the copyright and does not claim to it.All that is in this appendix are collected from free sources.If you are the author of the material or the copyright holder for it and against its use in this, please contact me and the material will be removed or will be listed your copyright.

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: There\'s a great variety of backgrounds: characters with their original clothing,outfits from later in the show, symbols, scenes, and a bunch of other stuff. And the icons are just adorable. Totally worth it.
